alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:49PM CDT until June 16 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1148 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Whitesboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Whitesboro, Denison, Howe, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Whitewright, Bells, Tom Bean, Knollwood, Dorchester, Randell Lake, Eisenhower State Park, Valley Lake, Lake Texoma, Southmayd, Sadler, Ida, Locust and Pilot Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
